faq_items.0.q: How accurate are your astrological calculations?
faq_items.0.a: We use Swiss Ephemeris — the most accurate astronomical data, recognized by professional astrologers worldwide. Accuracy is our top priority.
faq_items.1.q: How are AI interpretations better than standard ones?
faq_items.1.a: Unlike generic horoscopes, our AI creates a unique interpretation based on all your chart data: planetary positions, houses, and aspects between them. It's a deeply personalized analysis.
faq_items.2.a: Yes. We take privacy seriously. Your data is used exclusively for calculations within the app and is never shared with third parties.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about My Zodiac AI

0.question: What is a natal chart?
0.answer: A natal chart is an astrological diagram showing the positions of planets at the time of your birth. It reveals your strengths, talents, challenges, and life purpose. My Zodiac AI creates your chart based on your exact birth date, time, and location.

1.question: How does AI help with astrological forecasts?
1.answer: Our AI assistant analyzes your natal chart, current planetary transits, and astrological aspects to create personalized forecasts. It combines classical astrological knowledge with modern algorithms for the most accurate interpretations.

2.question: Is my personal data safe?
2.answer: Yes, security is our priority. All data is stored with encryption, and we never share information with third parties. Birth date and time are used exclusively for natal chart calculations.

3.question: What are the benefits of premium subscription?
3.answer: Premium subscription provides access to: detailed daily forecasts, partner compatibility analysis, yearly transit predictions, unlimited AI astrologer questions, and priority support.

4.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
4.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through account settings. Access to premium features will remain until the end of the paid period. Refunds are processed according to our policy.

5.question: How does the free version work?
5.answer: The free version includes basic daily horoscope for your zodiac sign, general monthly forecasts, and access to basic natal chart information. It's a great way to try the service.

6.question: Do I need the exact birth time?
6.answer: For the most accurate natal chart, it's best to know your exact birth time (within an hour). If you don't know the time, we'll use noon as an approximate time, but some aspects may be less precise.

7.question: How often are forecasts updated?
7.answer: Daily forecasts update every day at 00:00 in your timezone. Weekly forecasts update every Monday, monthly ones on the first day of the month. Transits are tracked in real-time.

footer.text: Didn't find the answer to your question?
